DOC.brief_summary: Hypothesis : Electrical stimulation abdominal vagus nerve anti-inflammatory effect lead faster postoperative recovery abdominal surgery . Aims : In present study , investigator want evaluate anti-inflammatory effect peroperative electrical stimulation vagus nerve . In addition , investigator want determine whether vagus nerve stimulation lead faster postoperative recovery . To end , follow aim formulate : 1. determine whether vagus nerve stimulation lead improvement gastrointestinal transit use radiological test 2. evaluate whether electrical stimulation vagus nerve lead clinical improvement ( daily questionnaire ) 3. show electrical stimulation intra-abdominal vagus nerve reduces inflammatory response abdominal surgery
